source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_00<tab>Duchesnelt would prevail upon a passing adventurer to search for his wayward daughter.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_00<tab>キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドのドゥシェネルは、ずいぶん慌てているようだが……？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_01<tab>Duchesnelt's daughter has slipped out alone, a move neither wise nor politic for a girl gently born. A frantic Duchesnelt would have you go to the Weeping Saint and speak with her.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_01<tab>ドゥシェネルの娘がひとりで外へ行ってしまったらしい。「聖ダナフェンの落涙」に行き「ドゥシェネルの娘」に話しかけよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_02<tab>While making light of her father's concern, the girl shows a streak of caution born of common sense. She bids you look about for anything suspicious in the vicinity.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_02<tab>冒険者の話を聞き、ドゥシェネルの娘は不安になってしまったようだ。周囲の様子を調べてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_03<tab>You find a man studying Duchesnelt's daughter with the intensity of a jackal. His hackles raised by your simple questions, he abruptly leaves, dropping something. Pick up the dull knife.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_03<tab>ドゥシェネルの娘を凝視している不審な男がいた。男が落とした「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873E01 /var>」を拾おう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_04<tab>There are less nefarious reasons a man might stare at a young woman. Have you deprived an honest fellow of his whittling tool, or was it something else? Show the dull knife to Duchesnelt's daughter.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_04<tab>あの不審な男の正体は、いったい何なのだろうか。「ドゥシェネルの娘」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873E01 /var>」を見せてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_05<tab>Uneasy at the sight of a blade brought into a holy place, Duchesnelt's daughter hastens back to Dragonhead. Perhaps Duchesnelt will know more, when you show him the knife.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_05<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873E01 /var>を見たドゥシェネルの娘は、キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドへ逃げ帰っていった。キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッドへ戻り、「ドゥシェネル」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873E01 /var>」を見せてみよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_06<tab>You show Duchesnelt the dull knife, confirming his suspicions. Even with his daughter's safe return, Duchesnelt fears that the unbelievers mean to harm her for their own mad purposes...
target: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_SEQ_06<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873E01 /var>を見たドゥシェネルは、不審な男が異端者であり、娘をつけ狙っていたのではないかと推測した。ドゥシェネルの心配は、まだまだ尽きないようだ……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_TODO_03<tab>Show the knife to Duchesnelt's daughter.
target: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_TODO_03<tab>ドゥシェネルの娘に<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873E01 /var>を見せる
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_TODO_04<tab>ドゥシェネルに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E873E01 /var>を渡す

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_000<tab>That daughter of mine! When she has a mind to do a thing, there's no stopping her. She's gone off to the Weeping Saint alone─I've told her time and again it's not safe with all the unbelievers about!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_000我が娘がたったひとり、伴もつけずに
「聖ダナフェンの落涙」へ出かけてしまったのだ。
昨今は、異端者が出没しているというのに……ああ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_001<tab>You're one of those fearless, fire-breathing adventurers, aren't you? Normally I'd tell you to stay away from my fine, high-spirited lass, but right now, I bid you go in hot pursuit to the Weeping Saint and bring her back safe and sound!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_001貴様、冒険者だな！？
急ぎ「聖ダナフェンの落涙」へ向かってくれ！
必ずや我が娘を連れ帰るのだ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_010<tab>My father sent <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> to fetch me back? My, he must be overstrung─he usually mislikes adventurers. He knows very well that I must have the blessed water, and one can hardly get it anywhere else.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_010……まぁまぁ、お父様から頼まれて、
わたくしを連れ戻しにいらしたと仰るの？
わたくしはただ、ここに聖水を汲みにきただけですのに。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_011<tab>Father means well, but I cannot have him ordering me home and insisting on armed chaperones. This war is older than he or his own father. What does he mean to do, hide me away in the tea caddy and hope that the war ends before I am old and grey?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_011困ったお父様、本当に心配性なのだから。
わかりました、これが済んだらすぐに戻りますわ。
のお仕事を、邪魔するわけには参りませんものね。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_012<tab>Still, I am not insensate to the dangers. Will you keep watch while I fetch the water? Who knows, you may discover an unbeliever in the woodworks.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_012わたくしが聖水を汲んでいる間、
は周囲の様子を見てきてくださいませんこと？
……だって、本当に異端者がいたら、怖ろしいですもの。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_015<tab>I must partake of some blessed water. Will you keep watch, in case an unbeliever is hiding under a teacup?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_015本当に異端者がいたら、怖ろしいですわ。
、わたくしが聖水を汲んでいる間、
周囲の様子を見てきてくださいませんこと？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_HERETIC_000_020<tab>Wh-What truck have I with you or you with me, huh? All may partake of the saint's tears, or do you not believe that I am worthy? I am, I am!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_HERETIC_000_020ななな、なんだ、お前はっ！
私がここで何をしていようと、
お、お前には……かか、関係ないだろうっ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_HERETIC_000_021<tab>I know what you're thinking, <var 08 E905 ((adventure-woman)) ((adventure-man)) /var>, I do. You're as transparent as that water there, the water <var 1A 02 /var>she's<var 1A 01 /var> taking. You think I'm one of those unbelievers. I find your accusations <var 1A 02 /var>vile<var 1A 01 /var> and remove myself from your foul presence!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_HERETIC_000_021まさかお前、わわ、私を異端者だと
疑っているのではあるまいな！？
ふ……不愉快だ、失礼するっ！！
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUMMY_000_000<tab>Eobjナイフにアクセス、取得する

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_030<tab>What's wrong? And what is it that you have in your hand?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_030どうなさいましたの？
……あら、その手に握っているものはなんです？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_040<tab>'Tis no soldier's weapon...and none but knights have leave to bring a weapon into a holy place. Perhaps there really was a heretic here─or I have somehow summoned one by my careless jest!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_040妙な様子の殿方が、これを？
……その殿方、本当に異端者だったのかもしれませんわ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_041<tab>I shall return to Camp Dragonhead forthwith─I am not easy in my mind. Kind adventurer, you'd do best not to linger.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_NOBLEDAUGHTER_000_041ああ、なんて怖ろしい！
わたくしは先に「キャンプ・ドラゴンヘッド」へ戻ります。
も早く、この場を立ち去ったほうがよろしくてよ！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_050<tab>I thank you for her safe return, but she is much subdued and will not tell me what passed at the Weeping Saint. I shall want answers, and quickly!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_050娘は戻ってきたが……
可哀想に、青い顔をして震えておるのだよ！
さあ、なにがあったか説明してもらおうか！

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_060<tab>A strangely furtive man, you say? Gazing fixed upon my girl─and armed in a holy place! It may well be an unbeliever, for who would risk doing such things?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_060妙な男が、娘を見つめていただと！？
しかもそやつは、異端者かもしれんというのか！？

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_061<tab>A girl of noble blood who eschews the seclusion that is her due makes an excellent prey. Of course I know this─many think me a scandal for allowing a daughter to run wild. And of course I worry, every day and every minute.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_061ふうむ……
その異端者、我が娘が貴族だと知って
つけ狙っておったのやもしれんな……。

source: TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_062<tab>Yet I would not take the world from her. She is what she is─a rambling rose─and she cannot help what she was born to. I will keep her safe. From a distance mayhap, but safe.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSB703_00898_DUCHESNELT_000_062ああ、娘よ！
可哀想な、我が最愛の娘よ！
お前のことは、この父が守ってみせようぞ！
